message.content:
cs.DB, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with mining associations from transaction data, which is a common task in database systems (cs.DB). The paper also proposes a novel model-based approach to finding frequent itemsets, which involves using a stochastic mixture model (the NB model) and a precision threshold to find local frequency thresholds for groups of itemsets. This approach involves machine learning techniques (cs.AI) and statistical modeling (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the limitations of the traditional support metric and proposes an alternative approach, which involves finding frequent itemsets based on a model-based frequency constraint. This approach involves data mining techniques (cs.DS) and information retrieval (cs.IR).
